author: wtopstaff
title: Flames-Canucks Sums
text:
0—2 
First Period_1, Calgary, D.Hamilton 1 (Gaudreau, Hudler), 5:00 (pp). Penalties_Bartkowski, Van (tripping), 4:12. 
Second Period_2, Vancouver, Horvat 1 (Baertschi, Hutton), 2:03 (pp). 3, Vancouver, McCann 1 (Hansen, Prust), 11:33. Penalties_Wideman, Cal (high-sticking), 1:51; Wideman, Cal (holding), 9:14; Engelland, Cal (roughing), 14:26; Bollig, Cal (roughing), 14:26; D.Sedin, Van (roughing), 14:26; Hudler, Cal (unsportsmanlike conduct), 16:42; Dorsett, Van (unsportsmanlike conduct), 16:42; Bartkowski, Van (interference), 17:51. 
Third Period_4, Calgary, Monahan 1 (Hudler, Gaudreau), 8:49. Penalties_Frolik, Cal (tripping), 13:52. 
Overtime_5, Calgary, Gaudreau 1 (Wideman), 3:03. Penalties_None. 
Shots on Goal_Calgary 15-10-12-1_38. Vancouver 9-11-8-2_30. 
Power-play opportunities_Calgary 1 of 2; Vancouver 1 of 4. 
Goalies_Calgary, Hiller 1-0-0 (30 shots-28 saves). Vancouver, Miller 1-0-1 (38-35). 
A_18,570 (18,910). T_2:36. 
Referees_Mike Leggo, Ian Walsh. Linesmen_Trent Knorr, Brad Lazarowich. Topics:
